column5: hope everyone gets out on the water or up at a cottage or campsite this long weekend. Myself, stuck in the city doing chores but at least it's quiet lol Stay warm, stay Â hydrated, and stay safe !
Will be working on getting the new transom into the boat this weekend. Still got some time before the ice goes out up here in da North EH.
Work, work ,work.. 3 twelves.. it truly is a long weekend..
